fullText: This valentine to the great producer-director Harold Prince is so packed with goodies that it feels more like a variety show than a legitimate revue.
dtliExcerpt: This valentine to the great producer-director Harold Prince is so packed with goodies that it feels more like a variety show than a legitimate revue.
